alert.note: Alert for Sussex (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 4:01PM EDT until July 25 at 4:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Sussex County in southern Delaware... * Until 445 PM EDT. * At 400 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Lewes to near Georgetown to near Seaford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Georgetown, Millsboro, Lewes, Milton, Bridgeville, Millville, Ellendale, Henlopen Acres, Cape Henlopen State Park, Long Neck, Ocean View, South Bethany and Dewey Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
